definitions.definition: The layer of gravel or other foundation on which a railway track is laid .
The land on which a railway (especially one that has been closed or dismantled ) was built ; the roadbed for a railroad.

main_definition: The layer of gravel or other foundation on which a railway track is laid .
secondary_definitions: ( loosely ) The land on which a railway (especially one that has been closed or dismantled ) was built ; the roadbed for a railroad.
